attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To call a General Election Now so the people can decide who it wants to run the country and to be allowed to judge this government on its past record

rejection.details:
There is a similar petiton at:
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/Decision2008/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
